hypothesis: Naming reduces outcome variance across domains

hurricanes.note: Hurricane naming began 1953; reliable records also begin ~1950. Cannot test unnamed era.
hurricanes.alternative: Could compare early naming era (1953-1970) vs modern era (1990+) for effect evolution

data_requirements: At least 30 ticker-only and 30 full-name coins with data
cryptocurrency.predicted_result: Ticker-only coins show 20-40% higher price variance
cryptocurrency.note: Variance test framework is complete and ready to run when data available

mental_health.predicted_result: Unnamed syndromes show 30-50% higher outcome variance
